meanings.definition: The fur or hair covering of a mammal.
meanings.sent1: The cat's soft pelages kept it warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: I brushed the dog's pelages to remove any loose fur.
meanings.sent3: The pelages of the bear made it look like a fluffy pillow.
meanings.sent4: Her luxurious pelages were envied by all her friends.
meanings.sent5: The pelages of the rabbit were as white as freshly fallen snow.

meanings.definition: The outer covering of feathers on a bird.
meanings.sent1: The colorful pelages of the peacock caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The pelages of the eagle were strong and sleek for flying.
meanings.sent3: The pelages of the chicken made it look like it was wearing a fancy coat.
meanings.sent4: Her pelages were as vibrant as a rainbow in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The pelages of the duck shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The skin or outer covering of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The snake's pelages felt smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The pelages of the fish were covered in shiny scales.
meanings.sent3: The pelages of the lizard made it blend in perfectly with the rocks.
meanings.sent4: Her delicate pelages were as fragile as a butterfly's wings.
meanings.sent5: The pelages of the turtle were tough and protective.
